name: Soni
description:
-- Instructions -- 

In this game, you play in a lab as Soni, an experiment that took a wrong turn. Your goal is to throw your clones at the scientists trying to take you down and survive as long as possible. 

For each killed scientist, your clones will bring you a lump of flesh. With enough of them, you can either choose to improve your score or be able to create a brand new clone !

If a clone brings multiple lumps of flesh at the same time, you get a combo and it'll help you get a level up way faster.

(Protip: by running in a circle, you can make your clones orbit around you and achieve huge combos !)

-- Controls --

WASD/ZQSD/Arrow Keys - Move

Left Click - Create a clone
